description: Creates an app block. App blocks are an Amazon AppStream 2.0 resource that stores the details about the virtual hard disk in an S3 bucket. It also stores the setup script with details about how to mount the virtual hard disk. The virtual hard disk includes the application binaries and other files necessary to launch your applications. Multiple applications can be assigned to a single app block. This is only supported for Elastic fleets.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the app block.

parameters.name: SourceS3Location
parameters.description: The source S3 location of the app block. The S3 bucket of the S3 object. S3Key (string) --- The S3 key of the S3 object. This is required when used for the following: IconS3Location (Actions: CreateApplication and UpdateApplication) SessionScriptS3Location (Actions: CreateFleet and UpdateFleet) ScriptDetails (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with CUSTOM PackagingType (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with APPSTREAM2 PackagingType, and using an existing application package (VHD file). In this case, S3Key refers to the VHD file. If a new application package is required, then S3Key is not required. (Actions: CreateAppBlock)

nested_params.name: S3Bucket
nested_params.description: The S3 bucket of the S3 object.

nested_params.name: S3Key
nested_params.description: The S3 key of the S3 object. This is required when used for the following:

parameters.name: SetupScriptDetails
parameters.description: The setup script details of the app block. This must be provided for the CUSTOM PackagingType. The S3 object location for the script. The S3 bucket of the S3 object. S3Key (string) --- The S3 key of the S3 object. This is required when used for the following: IconS3Location (Actions: CreateApplication and UpdateApplication) SessionScriptS3Location (Actions: CreateFleet and UpdateFleet) ScriptDetails (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with CUSTOM PackagingType (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with APPSTREAM2 PackagingType, and using an existing application package (VHD file). In this case, S3Key refers to the VHD file. If a new application package is required, then S3Key is not required. (Actions: CreateAppBlock) The run path for the script. ExecutableParameters (string) --- The runtime parameters passed to the run path for the script. The run timeout, in seconds, for the script.

nested_params.name: ScriptS3Location
nested_params.description: The S3 object location for the script.

nested_params.name: S3Bucket
nested_params.description: The S3 bucket of the S3 object.

nested_params.name: S3Key
nested_params.description: The S3 key of the S3 object. This is required when used for the following:

nested_params.name: ExecutablePath
nested_params.description: The run path for the script.

nested_params.name: ExecutableParameters
nested_params.description: The runtime parameters passed to the run path for the script.

nested_params.name: TimeoutInSeconds
nested_params.description: The run timeout, in seconds, for the script.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags assigned to the app block. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: PostSetupScriptDetails
parameters.description: The post setup script details of the app block. This can only be provided for the APPSTREAM2 PackagingType. The S3 object location for the script. The S3 bucket of the S3 object. S3Key (string) --- The S3 key of the S3 object. This is required when used for the following: IconS3Location (Actions: CreateApplication and UpdateApplication) SessionScriptS3Location (Actions: CreateFleet and UpdateFleet) ScriptDetails (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with CUSTOM PackagingType (Actions: CreateAppBlock) SourceS3Location when creating an app block with APPSTREAM2 PackagingType, and using an existing application package (VHD file). In this case, S3Key refers to the VHD file. If a new application package is required, then S3Key is not required. (Actions: CreateAppBlock) The run path for the script. ExecutableParameters (string) --- The runtime parameters passed to the run path for the script. The run timeout, in seconds, for the script.
